>>===== MODE =====>>
bibliography
<<===== MODE =====<<

>>===== RESULT =====>>
<div class="csl-bib-body">
  <div class="csl-entry"><div class="csl-left-margin">[1]</div><div class="csl-right-inline">Example. 7, 206â€“209.</div></div>
</div>
<<===== RESULT =====<<

>>===== CSL =====>>
<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl" default-locale="en-US">
  <bibliography entry-spacing="0" second-field-align="flush" et-al-min="15" et-al-use-first="1">
    <layout suffix=".">
      <text variable="citation-number" prefix="[" suffix="]"/>
      <group delimiter=". " suffix=".">
        <text variable="title"/>
        <group delimiter=", ">
          <text variable="volume"/>
          <text variable="page"/>
        </group>
      </group>
    </layout>
  </bibliography>
</style>

<<===== CSL =====<<

>>===== INPUT =====>>
[
    {
        "page": "206-209", 
        "title": "Example", 
        "type": "article-journal", 
        "volume": 7
    }
]
<<===== INPUT =====<<
